data.name: Options_Overlay_General_CheckBox_NoResetAfterGame
data.value: Don't reset decks after a game

data.name: Options_Overlay_General_CheckBox_FlavorText
data.value: Show card flavor text on mouseover (board/hand)

data.name: Options_Overlay_Interactivity_Label_Freezing
data.value: May cause the cursor to freeze occasionally

data.name: Options_Overlay_Interactivity_CheckBox_ForceOn
data.value: Force on (don't use this unless you need to)

data.name: Options_Overlay_Interactivity_CheckBox_FriendsList
data.value: Hide deck when friendslist is open

data.name: Options_Overlay_Interactivity_Label_Note
data.value: NOTE: May not work correctly if "options > overlay > general > automatically gray out secrets" is enabled.

data.name: Options_Overlay_Player_CheckBox_IncludeCreated
data.value: Include cards created in hand (e.g. The Coin)

data.name: Options_Overlay_Streaming_Text1
data.value: This will add a chroma-key-able copy of the overlay behind your Hearthstone window.

data.name: Options_Overlay_Streaming_Text2
data.value: Note: The overlay copy may show up in front Hearthstone once. Clicking it will hide it for the rest of the session.

data.name: Options_Overlay_Streaming_Hyperlink_Wiki
data.value: Show instructions for getting started (opens wiki)

data.name: Options_Tracker_Appearance_CheckBox_RedGreenStats
data.value: Red/green text color in stats summary

data.name: Options_Tracker_Backups_Text_Description
data.value: Backups are created automatically on the first start of each day. They contain decks, games and the config. If there are more than 7 (autogenerated) backups, the oldest one(s) are deleted automatically, leaving you with at least the past week.

data.name: Options_Tracker_General_CheckBox_Flash
data.value: Flash Hearthstone on your turn start

data.name: Options_Tracker_General_CheckBox_Font
data.value: Use default font for non-latin languages

data.name: Options_Tracker_General_CheckBox_FullTextSearch
data.value: Full text search in deck builder

data.name: Options_Tracker_General_CheckBox_LastPlayedDate
data.value: Show last played date on decks

data.name: Options_Tracker_General_CheckBox_AutoArchiveArena
data.value: Archive Arena decks when run is over

data.name: Options_Tracker_Importing_Constructed_Description
data.value: This will check for new and/or modified decks each time you enter the 'Play' menu.

data.name: Options_Tracker_Notifications_Label_ArenaReward
data.value: Show arena reward dialog when run is over

data.name: Options_Tracker_Replays_Claim_Description
data.value: Log in with your Battle.net credentials on HSReplay.net to claim your existing replays. This will open your web browser.

data.name: Options_Tracker_Replays_CheckBox_LocalViewer
data.value: Use local replay viewer by default (not maintained)

data.name: Options_Tracker_Settings_Analytics_Description
data.value: This only tracks very basic information to help us improve HDT, like app and match starts.

data.name: Options_Tracker_Stats_CheckBox_DiscardNoMatch
data.value: Discard game if deck does not match cards

data.name: Options_Tracker_Stats_CheckBox_KeepStatsWhenDeleting
data.value: Keep stats when deleting a deck*

data.name: Options_Tracker_Stats_CheckBox_KeepStatsWhenDeleting_Tooltip
data.value: This will move stats to the 'class default deck' (the same matches in no-deck mode are saved to). That means, runs in the arena statistics will be lost when deleting arena decks!

data.name: Options_Tracker_Stats_CheckBox_StatsWindow
data.value: Show deck stats in separate window

data.name: Stats_Arena_Advanced_Warning
data.value: These charts render a bit slow. Press refresh to update them.

data.name: Stats_Constructed_Games_Button_AddGame
data.value: Add new game to active deck

data.name: ArenaRewards_Label_Gold_Tooltip
data.value: You can enter values as e.g. 50+125

data.name: Stats_Constructed_Filters_CheckBox_TagFilters_Tooltip
data.value: Apply tag filteres currently set in 'DeckPicker' > 'Sort/Filter Decks' (double arrow button).

data.name: Importing_Constructed_Text_StartHearthstonePlay
data.value: Start Hearthstone and enter the 'Play' menu.

data.name: Importing_Constructed_Text_StartHearthstoneBrawl
data.value: Start Hearthstone and enter the 'Tavern Brawl' menu.

data.name: DeckSetIcons_Tooltip_Naxx
data.value: Deck contains cards from the Curse of Naxxramas expansion.

data.name: DeckSetIcons_Tooltip_Gvg
data.value: Deck contains cards from the Goblins vs Gnomes expansion.

data.name: DeckSetIcons_Tooltip_Brm
data.value: Deck contains cards from the Blackrock Mountain expansion.

data.name: DeckSetIcons_Tooltip_Tgt
data.value: Deck contains cards from The Grand Tournament expansion.

data.name: DeckSetIcons_Tooltip_Loe
data.value: Deck contains cards from the League of Explorers expansion.

data.name: DeckSetIcons_Tooltip_Wotog
data.value: Deck contains cards from the Whispers of the Old Gods expansion.

data.name: DeckSetIcons_Tooltip_Kara
data.value: Deck contains cards from the One Night in Karazhan expansion.

data.name: DeckNotes_Button_Save_Tooltip
data.value: Automatically saves when the dialog closes

data.name: Help_Overlay_Percentages_Text_General
data.value: The number of copies left in the deck for a specific card.

data.name: Help_Overlay_Percentages_Text_Draw
data.value: The chance of drawing a card with X copies left in the deck.

data.name: Help_Overlay_Percentages_Text1_Holding
data.value: The chance of your opponent holding a card at the start of the next turn with X copies left in play.

data.name: Help_Overlay_Percentages_Text2_Holding
data.value: This includes the next draw but nothing beyond that.

data.name: Help_Overlay_Customization_Text_Intro
data.value: Almost everything in the overlay can be turn on or off, moved and resized.

data.name: Help_Overlay_Customization_OnOff_Text
data.value: Options for this can be found under

data.name: Help_Overlay_Customization_Unlock_Text1
data.value: The overlay can be unlocked via

data.name: Help_Overlay_Customization_Hyperlink
data.value: Additional information can be found here.

data.name: Help_BugsFeatures_Option1_Text2
data.value: If there's no issue on the topic feel free to open a new one and/or even fix it yourself and create a pull request. For some futher information on what you might want to include in the issue

data.name: Help_BugsFeatures_Option2_Text_Email
data.value: 2) Send an email to support@hsdecktracker.net (english only)

data.name: Help_Github_Text3
data.value: contains a brief overview of all the features.

data.name: DeckPicker_Deck_Standard_Tooltip
data.value: This deck can be used in 'Standard' mode.

data.name: CrashDialog_Text
data.value: To help us find a solution for this issue, please attach a description of what you were doing just before this crash occoured, as well as any other helpful information you can think of.

data.name: DiscardGameDialog_Label_Description
data.value: cards played do not match the selected deck

data.name: MessageDialogs_DeleteGameStats_Multi_Text
data.value: This will delete the selected games

data.name: MessageDialogs_Restart_Text
data.value: HDT needs to be restarted for the changes to take effect.

data.name: MessageDialogs_ScrenshotAction_Description
data.value: "upload" will automatically upload the image to imgur.com

data.name: MessageDialogs_LogConfig_Title
data.value: There was a problem updating the log.config

data.name: MessageDialogs_LogConfig_Description1
data.value: New log.config settings are required for HDT to function correctly.

data.name: MessageDialogs_LogConfig_Description3
data.value: If that does not help, click "show instructions" to see how to update it manually.
